title.en: The Prayer of the Words of Truth

text.en: Namo ratnatrayāya!1
text.en-trans: namo  ratna  trayaya

text.en: Masters of the glory of an ocean of boundless qualities,
text.en-trans: tsé  mé  yönten  gyamtsöi  pal  nga  zhing

text.en: Who look upon all helpless beings as if they were an only child,
text.en-trans: nyam  chung  dro  la  pu  chik  tar  gongpé

text.en: Sugatas of the past, present and future, bodhisattvas and those in training,
text.en-trans: dü  sum  deshek  sé  dang  lobmar  ché

text.en: Hear these truthful lamentations of mine, I pray!
text.en-trans: dak  gi  denpé  mengak  dir  gong  shik

text.en: Let the complete teaching of the Sage, which dispels the miseries of existence and quiescence,
text.en-trans: si  zhi  dung  sel  yongdzok  tubpé  ten

text.en: Spread as the glory of benefit and happiness for the whole world!
text.en-trans: dzam  ling  yangpé  pendéi  pal  du  gyé

text.en: And among the learned and accomplished holders of these teachings
text.en-trans: dé  dzin  khé  dang  drubpé  kyebu  nam

text.en: Let the activity of the ten dharmic actions increase!
text.en-trans: chö  chö  nam  chüi  chawa  pelwar  dzö

text.en: Totally overcome by intense and inexhaustible negative karma,
text.en-trans: mi  zé  lé  ngen  drakpöi  yong  nönpé

text.en: Beings are worn out and tormented by relentlessduḥkha.2
text.en-trans: barmé  duhkhé  narwé  nyam  tak  dro

text.en: Let all the terrors of unbearable illness, warfare and famine
text.en-trans: zö  ké  né  tsön  mugéi  jikpa  kun

text.en: Be pacified, and relieved by an ocean of bliss!
text.en-trans: zhi  né  dega  gyamtsor  uk  yung  dzö

text.en: And especially for the practitioners in the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: khyepar  gang  jong  chö  den  kyé  dro  nam

text.en: Mercilessly conquered by uncivilized forces of evil,
text.en-trans: nak  chok  lalöi  pung  gi  tsé  mé  du

text.en: Let the flowing stream of their blood and tears
text.en-trans: ngen  gü  jompé  trak  dang  chimé  gyün

text.en: Be swiftly halted by the powerful might of compassion!
text.en-trans: nyur  du  chépé  tukjéi  tu  pung  kyé

text.en: Those who are driven mad by the demon of negative emotions,
text.en-trans: nyönmong  dön  gyi  nyöpé  lang  chö  kyi

text.en: And pitifully bring ruin upon themselves and others through their reckless actions—
text.en-trans: rang  zhen  nyi  pung  gyipé  nyingjéi  yul

text.en: Let such impudent beings gain the vision of what to adopt and abandon,
text.en-trans: mi  sün  kyéwé  tsok  nam  lang  dor  mik

text.en: And meet with kind and loving friends!
text.en-trans: yong  top  jam  tsé  dzawé  pal  la  jor

text.en: Let the object of my most long-standing and heartfelt wish:
text.en-trans: ring  né  nying  du  nakpé  döpé  dön

text.en: The marvel of total independence and freedom for Tibet,
text.en-trans: yongdzok  pö  jong  rang  wang  tsangmé  pal

text.en: Be spontaneously accomplished! And let us be swiftly granted
text.en-trans: lhun  drup  chö  si  zung  drel  ga  tön  la

text.en: The good fortune to celebrate the unity of Dharma and affairs of state!
text.en-trans: chöpé  kalzang  nyurwa  nyi  du  tsöl

text.en: Giving away their bodies held so dear, their lives and their possessions,
text.en-trans: ten  dang  dé  dzin  chapsi  rang  rik  lé

text.en: For the sake of the teachings and those who maintain them, for our culture and unique traditions—
text.en-trans: chépé  lü  sok  longchö  yong  tang  té

text.en: Let those accomplished beings who undergo so many hardships,
text.en-trans: kawa  gya  trak  drubpé  kyewo  nam

text.en: Be protected by the compassionate lord of the Potala!3
text.en-trans: dru  dzin  gön  dé  tukjé  kyongwar  dzö

text.en: In short, I pray that all the vast prayers of aspiration
text.en-trans: dor  na  gönpo  chenrézik  wang  gi

text.en: The lord Avalokiteśvara made for the land of Tibet
text.en-trans: sé  ché  gyalwé  chen  ngar  gang  chen  zhing

text.en: In the presence of buddhas and their bodhisattva heirs,
text.en-trans: yong  zung  gya  chen  mönlam  gang  dzépé

text.en: Swiftly come to their positive fruition here and now!
text.en-trans: dré  zang  deng  dir  nyur  du  charwar  söl

text.en: Through the interdependence of the profound intrinsic nature of appearance and emptiness,
text.en-trans: nang  tong  chönyi  zabmöi  tendrel  dang

text.en: Through the power of the compassionate Three Jewels, by the force of these words of truth,
text.en-trans: chok  sum  tukjéi  tu  dang  dentsik  top

text.en: And through the strength of the infallible truth of cause and effect,
text.en-trans: lé  dré  lu  mé  den  tü  dak  chak  gi

text.en: May this, our prayer of truth, be swiftly accomplished without any hindrance!
text.en-trans: denpé  mönlam  gekmé  nyur  drup  shok
